metadata.Title: CVE-2014-7847 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
iplookup/index.php in Moodle through 2.4.11, 2.5.x before 2.5.9, 2.6.x before 2.6.6, and 2.7.x before 2.7.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (resource consumption) by triggering the calculation of an estimated latitude and longitude for an IP address.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-7847` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.7.5+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.5+dfsg-1').
